1: Song of ascensions. In Jehovah turning back the returning of we were as those dreaming.
2: Then our mouth will be filled with laughter, and our tongue with rejoicing: then shall they say among the nations, Jehovah magnified to do with those.
3: Jehovah magnified to do with us; we were made glad.
4: Jehovah turned back our captivity, as torrents in the south.
5: They sowing in tears shall reap in rejoicing.
6: He going, shall go; and weeping he lifted up the drawing of the seed: coming, he shall come with joy, lifting up his sheaves.
